thread.title: Kelly Clarkson: Baby No. 2 is a boy

title: Kelly Clarkson: Baby No. 2 is a boy
text:
Kelly Clarkson: Baby No. 2 is a boy Singer Instagrams news that River is getting a little brother soon. Post to Facebook Kelly Clarkson: Baby No. 2 is a boy Singer Instagrams news that River is getting a little brother soon. Check out this story on USATODAY.com: http://usat.ly/1S2KLA4 Cancel Send A link has been sent to your friend's email address. Posted! A link has been posted to your Facebook feed. 1 To find out more about Facebook commenting please read the Conversation Guidelines and FAQs Kelly Clarkson: Baby No. 2 is a boy Jayme Deerwester , USA TODAY 12:37 p.m. EDT October 24, 2015 Kelly Clarkson says her second baby is a boy. (Photo: Jeff Kravitz, Getty images) 3 CONNECT 19 TWEET LINKEDIN 1 COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
Kelly Clarkson knows what her firstborn child, daughter River, is getting for Christmas: a baby brother. 
OK, it's more like an IOU because she hasn't said when her second baby is due, but nevertheless, the news is out there, via her Instagram account on Friday. 
"In other news, River's gonna have a little baby brother," she posted, adding that she and husband Brandon Blackstock are "so excited!" A photo posted by Kelly Clarkson (@kellyclarkson) on Oct 23, 2015 at 8:59am PDT 
The inaugural American Idol winner-turned-pop star first spilled the beans about Baby No. 2 back in August, when she asked a Los Angeles audience to overlook her overactive hormones. "I'm totally pregnant," the always upfront Clarkson announced unexpectedly, explaining, "I was crying and I didn't want you to think I was crazy." Kelly Clarkson: 'I'm totally pregnant' 
Carrying River, who turns 2 in June, was no cakewalk for the first-time mom. In 2013, she confessed to several interviewers that she'd had a " horrible pregnancy ," suffering hyperemesis gravidarum , the same severe morning sickness that plagued Duchess Kate for both of her pregnancies.
